ingredients.item: 450g tub Onken Mango, Papaya & Passionfuit Yogurt
1 large ripe mango, cut into thin wedges

instructions.step: Take 4 breakfast bowls. Spoon 1 tbsp granola into the base of each and top with the yogurt.
Arrange the mango wedges over the top and squeeze over a little lime juice. Finish with a final scattering of granola, to serve.
